abstract: They squared off in the 1982 World Series, won by St. Louis. Now they will meet in the National League Championship Series.
snippet: They squared off in the 1982 World Series, won by St. Louis. Now they will meet in the National League Championship Series.
lead_paragraph: Three years later, the memory was still vivid for Mark Attanasio, the owner of the Milwaukee Brewers. Before a game at Miller Park last month, Attanasio described the scene on the field in 2008, when the Brewers clinched a playoff berth and he learned just how much the team means to his adopted city.

headline.main: A Long Time in the Making, a Brewers-Cardinals Rematch
